item1.value: <script>(function() {var el = document.getElementById('engrain-sightmap');var id = el.getAttribute('data-sightmap-id');el.setAttribute('src', 'https://sightmap.com/embed/'+id+'?enable_api=1&origin='+location.origin);var embed = new SightMap.Embed('engrain-sightmap');var hideUIStr = el.getAttribute('data-sightmap-hide-ui');var hideUI = hideUIStr ? hideUIStr.split(",").map(function(e) { return e.trim(); }) : [];embed.disableUI(hideUI);console.log('after disable', hideUI);embed.on('ready', function() {embed.disableUI(hideUI);console.log('after ready', hideUI);});})();</script>

item2.value: ×

item4.value:
<script>                var modal = document.getElementById('schedule-tour-modal');
        var btnByClass = document.getElementsByClassName("schedule-tour-popup-button");
        if (window.location.href.indexOf("#schedule-tour-popup-button") !== -1) {
            window.openScheduleTourPopup();
        }
         var embedHolder = document.getElementById('embedHolder');
        if (embedHolder && (!embedHolder.innerHTML || embedHolder.innerHTML.indexOf("iframe")  === -1)){ 
            embedHolder.innerHTML = "<iframe loading='lazy' id='ifrm' src='" + scheduleATourUrl + "' style='border:0;' frameborder='0' />";        
        }
        var span = document.getElementsByClassName("schedule_popup_close")[0];
        for (var i = 0, len = btnByClass.length | 0; i < len; i = i + 1 | 0) {
            btnByClass[i].onclick = openScheduleTourPopup;
        }
        if(span) {
            span.onclick = function () {
                modal.style.display = "none";
            }
        }
        window.onclick = function (event) {
            if (event.target == modal) {
                modal.style.display = "none";
            }
        }</script>

item5.value: <!-- OneTrust Cookies Consent Notice start --> <script type="text/javascript" src="https://cdn.cookielaw.org/consent/${site.oneTrustCookiesId}/OtAutoBlock.js" ></script> <script src="https://cdn.cookielaw.org/scripttemplates/otSDKStub.js" type="text/javascript" charset="UTF-8" data-domain-script="${site.oneTrustCookiesId}" ></script> <script type="text/javascript"> function OptanonWrapper() { } </script> <!-- OneTrust Cookies Consent Notice end -->

item6.value:
<script>
(function () {
    var widget_key = "${rentgrataKey}";
    if (!widget_key || widget_key.indexOf("$") == 0) return; //this means the code could not replace the rentgrataKey it doesn't exit
    var hjs = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    var js = document.createElement('script');
    js.async = true;
    js.src = 'https://widget.rentgrata.com/rentgrata.js';
    js.addEventListener('load', function () {
        var args = {
            widget_key: widget_key
        }
        window.rentgrata.Widget.render(args);
    });
    hjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, hjs);
})();
</script>

item_1.value: <script>(function() {var el = document.getElementById('engrain-sightmap');var id = el.getAttribute('data-sightmap-id');el.setAttribute('src', 'https://sightmap.com/embed/'+id+'?enable_api=1&origin='+location.origin);var embed = new SightMap.Embed('engrain-sightmap');var hideUIStr = el.getAttribute('data-sightmap-hide-ui');var hideUI = hideUIStr ? hideUIStr.split(",").map(function(e) { return e.trim(); }) : [];embed.disableUI(hideUI);console.log('after disable', hideUI);embed.on('ready', function() {embed.disableUI(hideUI);console.log('after ready', hideUI);});})();</script>
